beauty.name: Brideface
beauty.about: The most highly sought after beauty team in Cincinnati! We specialize in airbrush foundation and individual lash enhancements for flawless, long-wearing, stunning makeup that looks just as gorgeous in real life as on camera. Enhance your photography investment with pro makeup!

beauty.name: Rollers and Rouge
beauty.about: Here we are in 2018 with 14 amazingly talented stylists in Cincinnati and Denver, still with the same                 mission that every bride should afford to feel beautiful!  Having only raised our prices 3 times in the               last 5 years, we are proud to say we offer the highest quality service and unparalleled work at prices                well below our competitors! We love our brides and every single wedding is such an honor to be a part of.             We would love to hear from you!

beauty.name: Chenese Bean Makeup Artistry
beauty.about: With over 20 years experience, Chenese is highly sought after with stellar creativity and clientele                   (past & present) who provides quality services in the categories shown below.  Select your area of                    interest to view photos of her work.

prices.option: Bridesmaids, Maid of Honor, Matron of Honor

beauty.name: Toolbox Studio Salon
beauty.about: Toolbox Studio Salon has the “extra tools “you need to be your best self!  Each and every person who walks through our door is unique and special to us. Our team constantly provides our customers with top notch service, high end products and consistent work ethic so that we keep them coming back for years to come.

beauty.name: Cinci Makeup
beauty.about: Cinci Makeup is an experienced team of makeup artists that specialize in high definition makeup that will have the longevity to last until your final dance. Let us wave our magical makeup wands to make your bridal dreams come true and grant you the most beautiful version of yourself!

beauty.name: CoCo Creative Wellness
beauty.about: The beauty team at CoCo is passionate about helping to make our Bridal Clients’ special day one to remember.  We are happy to offer a complimentary consultation on how we can help realize your beauty dreams https://ed..generika/! As an addition to our hair and makeup services, we are here to accommodate bridal parties for nail, skin, and waxing appointments the day of, or the week leading up to your day. Allow us to exceed your wildest wedding dreams!
